component.name: GlowBerry
component.summary: Enhanced background service for COSMIC desktop with live shader support

description.p: GlowBerry is an enhanced background/wallpaper service for the COSMIC desktop environment. It extends the official cosmic-bg with live shader wallpaper support, allowing animated GPU-rendered backgrounds using WGSL shaders.

ul.li: Static image wallpapers (JPEG, PNG, WebP, JPEG XL)
Can be installed alongside official cosmic-bg
Switch between GlowBerry and cosmic-bg via update-alternatives
